MASTER_BALL.name: MASTER BALL

GREAT_BALL.description:

SAFARI_BALL.description:

NET_BALL.name: NET BALL

REPEAT_BALL.name: REPEAT BALL
REPEAT_BALL.description:

slightly lowers the
foe's accuracy.

LUCKY_PUNCH.name: LUCKY PUNCH
LUCKY_PUNCH.description:
A hold item that
raises CHANSEY's
critical-hit rate.

METAL_POWDER.name: METAL POWDER
METAL_POWDER.description:
A hold item that
raises DITTO's
DEFENSE.

THICK_CLUB.name: THICK CLUB
THICK_CLUB.description:
A hold item that 
raises CUBONE or
MAROWAK's ATTACK.

STICK.name: STICK
STICK.description:
A hold item that
raises FARFETCH'D's
critical-hit ratio.

RED_SCARF.name: RED SCARF
RED_SCARF.description:
A hold item that
raises COOL in
CONTESTS.

BLUE_SCARF.name: BLUE SCARF
BLUE_SCARF.description:
A hold item that
raises BEAUTY in
CONTESTS.

PINK_SCARF.name: PINK SCARF
PINK_SCARF.description:
A hold item that
raises CUTE in
CONTESTS.

GREEN_SCARF.name: GREEN SCARF
GREEN_SCARF.description:
A hold item that
raises SMART in
CONTESTS.

YELLOW_SCARF.name: YELLOW SCARF
YELLOW_SCARF.description:
A hold item that
raises TOUGH in
CONTESTS.

MACH_BIKE.name: MACH BIKE
MACH_BIKE.description:
A folding bicycle
that doubles your
speed or better.

COIN_CASE.name: COIN CASE
COIN_CASE.description:
A case that holds
up to 9,999 COINS.

ITEMFINDER.name: ITEMFINDER
ITEMFINDER.description:
A device that
signals an invisible
item by sound.

OLD_ROD.name: OLD ROD
OLD_ROD.description:
Use by any body of
water to fish for
wild POKéMON.

GOOD_ROD.name: GOOD ROD
GOOD_ROD.description:
A decent fishing
rod for catching
wild POKéMON.

SUPER_ROD.name: SUPER ROD
SUPER_ROD.description:
The best fishing
rod for catching
wild POKéMON.

SS_TICKET.name: S.S. TICKET
SS_TICKET.description:
The ticket required
for sailing on a
ferry.

CONTEST_PASS.name: CONTEST PASS
CONTEST_PASS.description:
The pass required
for entering
POKéMON CONTESTS.

WAILMER_PAIL.name: WAILMER PAIL
WAILMER_PAIL.description:
A tool used for
watering BERRIES
and plants.

DEVON_GOODS.name: DEVON GOODS
DEVON_GOODS.description:
A package that
contains DEVON's
machine parts.

SOOT_SACK.name: SOOT SACK
SOOT_SACK.description:
A sack used to
gather and hold
volcanic ash.

BASEMENT_KEY.name: BASEMENT KEY
BASEMENT_KEY.description:
The key for NEW
MAUVILLE beneath
MAUVILLE CITY.

ACRO_BIKE.name: ACRO BIKE
ACRO_BIKE.description:
A folding bicycle
capable of jumps
and wheelies.

POKEBLOCK_CASE.name: {POKEBLOCK} CASE
POKEBLOCK_CASE.description:
A case for holding
{POKEBLOCK}S made with
a BERRY BLENDER.

LETTER.name: LETTER
LETTER.description:
A letter to STEVEN
from the PRESIDENT
of the DEVON CORP.

EON_TICKET.name: EON TICKET
EON_TICKET.description:
The ticket for a
ferry to a distant
southern island.

RED_ORB.name: RED ORB
RED_ORB.description:
A red, glowing orb
said to contain an
ancient power.

BLUE_ORB.name: BLUE ORB
BLUE_ORB.description:
A blue, glowing orb
said to contain an
ancient power.

SCANNER.name: SCANNER
SCANNER.description:
A device found
inside the
ABANDONED SHIP.

GO_GOGGLES.name: GO-GOGGLES
GO_GOGGLES.description:
Nifty goggles that
protect eyes from
desert sandstorms.

METEORITE.name: METEORITE
METEORITE.description:
A meteorite found
at METEOR FALLS.

ROOM_1_KEY.name: RM. 1 KEY
ROOM_1_KEY.description:
A key that opens a
door inside the
ABANDONED SHIP.

ROOM_2_KEY.name: RM. 2 KEY
ROOM_2_KEY.description:
A key that opens a
door inside the
ABANDONED SHIP.

ROOM_4_KEY.name: RM. 4 KEY
ROOM_4_KEY.description:
A key that opens a
door inside the
ABANDONED SHIP.

ROOM_6_KEY.name: RM. 6 KEY
ROOM_6_KEY.description:
A key that opens a
door inside the
ABANDONED SHIP.

STORAGE_KEY.name: STORAGE KEY
STORAGE_KEY.description:
The key to the
storage inside the
ABANDONED SHIP.

ROOT_FOSSIL.name: ROOT FOSSIL
ROOT_FOSSIL.description:
A fossil of an
ancient, seafloor-
dwelling POKéMON.

CLAW_FOSSIL.name: CLAW FOSSIL
CLAW_FOSSIL.description:
A fossil of an
ancient, seafloor-
dwelling POKéMON.

DEVON_SCOPE.name: DEVON SCOPE
DEVON_SCOPE.description:
A device by DEVON
that signals any
unseeable POKéMON.

TM01_FOCUS_PUNCH.name: TM01
TM01_FOCUS_PUNCH.description:
Powerful, but makes
the user flinch if
hit by the foe.

TM02_DRAGON_CLAW.name: TM02
TM02_DRAGON_CLAW.description:
Hooks and slashes
the foe with long,
sharp claws.

TM03_WATER_PULSE.name: TM03
TM03_WATER_PULSE.description:
Generates an
ultrasonic wave
that may confuse.

TM04_CALM_MIND.name: TM04
TM04_CALM_MIND.description:
Raises SP. ATK and
SP. DEF by focusing
the mind.

TM05_ROAR.name: TM05
TM05_ROAR.description:
A savage roar that
makes the foe flee 
to end the battle.

TM06_TOXIC.name: TM06
TM06_TOXIC.description:
Poisons the foe
with a toxin that
gradually worsens.

TM07_HAIL.name: TM07
TM07_HAIL.description:
Creates a hailstorm
that damages all
types except ICE.

TM08_BULK_UP.name: TM08
TM08_BULK_UP.description:
Bulks up the body
to boost both
ATTACK & DEFENSE.

TM09_BULLET_SEED.name: TM09
TM09_BULLET_SEED.description:
Shoots 2 to 5 seeds
in a row to strike
the foe.

TM10_HIDDEN_POWER.name: TM10
TM10_HIDDEN_POWER.description:
The attack power
varies among
different POKéMON.

TM11_SUNNY_DAY.name: TM11
TM11_SUNNY_DAY.description:
Raises the power of
FIRE-type moves
for 5 turns.

TM12_TAUNT.name: TM12
TM12_TAUNT.description:
Enrages the foe so
it can only use
attack moves.

TM13_ICE_BEAM.name: TM13
TM13_ICE_BEAM.description:
Fires an icy cold
beam that may
freeze the foe.

TM14_BLIZZARD.name: TM14
TM14_BLIZZARD.description:
A brutal snow-and-
wind attack that
may freeze the foe.

TM15_HYPER_BEAM.name: TM15
TM15_HYPER_BEAM.description:
Powerful, but needs
recharging the
next turn.

TM16_LIGHT_SCREEN.name: TM16
TM16_LIGHT_SCREEN.description:
Creates a wall of
light that lowers
SP. ATK damage.

TM17_PROTECT.name: TM17
TM17_PROTECT.description:
Negates all damage,
but may fail if used
in succession.

TM18_RAIN_DANCE.name: TM18
TM18_RAIN_DANCE.description:
Raises the power of
WATER-type moves
for 5 turns.

TM19_GIGA_DRAIN.name: TM19
TM19_GIGA_DRAIN.description:
Recovers half the
HP of the damage 
this move inflicts.

TM20_SAFEGUARD.name: TM20
TM20_SAFEGUARD.description:
Prevents status
abnormality with a
mystical power.

TM21_FRUSTRATION.name: TM21
TM21_FRUSTRATION.description:
The less the user
likes you, the more
powerful this move.

TM22_SOLARBEAM.name: TM22
TM22_SOLARBEAM.description:
Absorbs sunlight in
the 1st turn, then
attacks next turn.

TM23_IRON_TAIL.name: TM23
TM23_IRON_TAIL.description:
Slams the foe with
a hard tail. It may
lower DEFENSE.

TM24_THUNDERBOLT.name: TM24
TM24_THUNDERBOLT.description:
A powerful electric
attack that may
cause paralysis.

TM25_THUNDER.name: TM25
TM25_THUNDER.description:
Strikes the foe
with a thunderbolt.
It may paralyze.

TM26_EARTHQUAKE.name: TM26
TM26_EARTHQUAKE.description:
Causes a quake
that has no effect
on flying foes.

TM27_RETURN.name: TM27
TM27_RETURN.description:
The more the user
likes you, the more
powerful this move.

TM28_DIG.name: TM28
TM28_DIG.description:
Digs underground
the 1st turn, then
strikes next turn.

TM29_PSYCHIC.name: TM29
TM29_PSYCHIC.description:
A powerful psychic
attack that may
lower SP. DEF.

TM30_SHADOW_BALL.name: TM30
TM30_SHADOW_BALL.description:
Hurls a dark lump
at the foe. It may
lower SP. DEF.

TM31_BRICK_BREAK.name: TM31
TM31_BRICK_BREAK.description:
Destroys barriers
like LIGHT SCREEN
and causes damage.

TM32_DOUBLE_TEAM.name: TM32
TM32_DOUBLE_TEAM.description:
Creates illusory
copies to enhance
elusiveness.

TM33_REFLECT.name: TM33
TM33_REFLECT.description:
Creates a wall of
light that weakens
physical attacks.

TM34_SHOCK_WAVE.name: TM34
TM34_SHOCK_WAVE.description:
Zaps the foe with a
jolt of electricity
that never misses.

TM35_FLAMETHROWER.name: TM35
TM35_FLAMETHROWER.description:
Looses a stream of
fire that may burn
the foe.

TM36_SLUDGE_BOMB.name: TM36
TM36_SLUDGE_BOMB.description:
Hurls sludge at the
foe. It may poison
the foe.

TM37_SANDSTORM.name: TM37
TM37_SANDSTORM.description:
Causes a sandstorm
that hits the foe
over several turns.

TM38_FIRE_BLAST.name: TM38
TM38_FIRE_BLAST.description:
A powerful fire
attack that may
burn the foe.

TM39_ROCK_TOMB.name: TM39
TM39_ROCK_TOMB.description:
Stops the foe from
moving with rocks.
May lower SPEED.

TM40_AERIAL_ACE.name: TM40
TM40_AERIAL_ACE.description:
An extremely fast
attack that can't
be avoided.

TM41_TORMENT.name: TM41
TM41_TORMENT.description:
Prevents the foe
from using the same
move in a row.

TM42_FACADE.name: TM42
TM42_FACADE.description:
Raises ATTACK when
poisoned, burned,
or paralyzed.

TM43_SECRET_POWER.name: TM43
TM43_SECRET_POWER.description:
Adds an effect to
attack depending
on the location.

TM44_REST.name: TM44
TM44_REST.description:
The user sleeps for
2 turns to restore
health and status.

TM45_ATTRACT.name: TM45
TM45_ATTRACT.description:
Makes it tough to
attack a foe of the
opposite gender.

TM46_THIEF.name: TM46
TM46_THIEF.description:
While attacking,
it may steal the
foe's held item.

TM47_STEEL_WING.name: TM47
TM47_STEEL_WING.description:
Spreads hard-
edged wings and
slams into the foe.

TM48_SKILL_SWAP.name: TM48
TM48_SKILL_SWAP.description:
Switches abilities
with the foe on the
turn this is used.

TM49_SNATCH.name: TM49
TM49_SNATCH.description:
Steals the effects
of the move the foe
is trying to use.

TM50_OVERHEAT.name: TM50
TM50_OVERHEAT.description:
Enables full-power
attack, but sharply
lowers SP. ATK.

HM01_CUT.name: HM01
HM01_CUT.description:
Attacks the foe
with sharp blades
or claws.

HM02_FLY.name: HM02
HM02_FLY.description:
Flies up on the
first turn, then
attacks next turn.

HM03_SURF.name: HM03
HM03_SURF.description:
Creates a huge
wave, then crashes
it down on the foe.

HM04_STRENGTH.name: HM04
HM04_STRENGTH.description:
Builds enormous
power, then slams
the foe.

HM05_FLASH.name: HM05
HM05_FLASH.description:
Looses a powerful
blast of light that
reduces accuracy.

HM06_ROCK_SMASH.name: HM06
HM06_ROCK_SMASH.description:
A rock-crushingly
tough attack that
may lower DEFENSE.

HM07_WATERFALL.name: HM07
HM07_WATERFALL.description:
Attacks the foe
with enough power
to climb waterfalls.

HM08_DIVE.name: HM08
HM08_DIVE.description:
Dives underwater
the 1st turn, then
attacks next turn.

OAKS_PARCEL.name: OAK'S PARCEL
OAKS_PARCEL.description:
A parcel for PROF.
OAK from a POKéMON
MART's clerk.

POKE_FLUTE.name: POKé FLUTE
POKE_FLUTE.description:
A sweet-sounding
flute that awakens
POKéMON.

SECRET_KEY.name: SECRET KEY
SECRET_KEY.description:
The key to the
CINNABAR ISLAND
GYM's entrance.

BIKE_VOUCHER.name: BIKE VOUCHER
BIKE_VOUCHER.description:
A voucher for
obtaining a bicycle
from the BIKE SHOP.

GOLD_TEETH.name: GOLD TEETH
GOLD_TEETH.description:
Gold dentures lost
by the SAFARI
ZONE's WARDEN.

OLD_AMBER.name: OLD AMBER
OLD_AMBER.description:
A stone containing
the genes of an
ancient POKéMON.

CARD_KEY.name: CARD KEY
CARD_KEY.description:
A card-type door
key used in SILPH
CO's office.

LIFT_KEY.name: LIFT KEY
LIFT_KEY.description:
An elevator key
used in TEAM
ROCKET's HIDEOUT.

HELIX_FOSSIL.name: HELIX FOSSIL
HELIX_FOSSIL.description:
A piece of an
ancient marine
POKéMON's seashell.

DOME_FOSSIL.name: DOME FOSSIL
DOME_FOSSIL.description:
A piece of an
ancient marine
POKéMON's shell.

SILPH_SCOPE.name: SILPH SCOPE
SILPH_SCOPE.description:
SILPH CO's scope
makes unseeable
POKéMON visible.

BICYCLE.name: BICYCLE
BICYCLE.description:
A folding bicycle
that is faster than
the RUNNING SHOES.

TOWN_MAP.name: TOWN MAP
TOWN_MAP.description:
Can be viewed
anytime. Shows your
present location.

VS_SEEKER.name: VS SEEKER
VS_SEEKER.description:
A rechargeable unit
that flags battle-
ready TRAINERS.

FAME_CHECKER.name: FAME CHECKER
FAME_CHECKER.description:
Stores information
on famous people
for instant recall.

TM_CASE.name: TM CASE
TM_CASE.description:
A convenient case 
that holds TMs and
HMs.

BERRY_POUCH.name: BERRY POUCH
BERRY_POUCH.description:
A convenient
container that
holds BERRIES.

TEACHY_TV.name: TEACHY TV
TEACHY_TV.description:
A TV set tuned to
an advice program
for TRAINERS.

TRI_PASS.name: TRI-PASS
TRI_PASS.description:
A pass for ferries
between ONE, TWO,
and THREE ISLAND.

RAINBOW_PASS.name: RAINBOW PASS
RAINBOW_PASS.description:
For ferries serving
VERMILION and the
SEVII ISLANDS.

TEA.name: TEA
TEA.description:
A thirst-quenching
tea prepared by an
old lady.

MYSTIC_TICKET.name: MYSTICTICKET
MYSTIC_TICKET.description:
A ticket required
to board the ship
to NAVEL ROCK.

AURORA_TICKET.name: AURORATICKET
AURORA_TICKET.description:
A ticket required
to board the ship
to BIRTH ISLAND.

POWDER_JAR.name: POWDER JAR
POWDER_JAR.description:
Stores BERRY
POWDER made using
a BERRY CRUSHER.

RUBY.name: RUBY
RUBY.description:
An exquisite, red-
glowing gem that
symbolizes passion.

SAPPHIRE.name: SAPPHIRE
SAPPHIRE.description:
A brilliant blue gem
that symbolizes
honesty.

MAGMA_EMBLEM.name: MAGMA EMBLEM
MAGMA_EMBLEM.description:
A medal-like item in
the same shape as
TEAM MAGMA's mark.

OLD_SEA_MAP.name: OLD SEA MAP
OLD_SEA_MAP.description:
A faded sea chart
that shows the way
to a certain island.
